info.name: Material Design for Youtube
info.description:
IMPORTANT THIS STYLE ONLY WORKS WITH CHROME, IT MAY WORK WITH OTHER WEBKIT BASED BROWSERS, AT LEAST FOR NOW.


 Redesigned Youtube using material design guidelines.
info.additionalInfo: This is work in progress as there are many places too polish, in a future I might find a way too fix other browsers compatibility.
